      • searchActivities

        public static java.util.Collection<AmpActivityVersion> searchActivities(java.lang.Long ampThemeId,
                                                                        java.lang.String statusCode,
                                                                        java.lang.String donorOrgId,
                                                                        java.util.Date fromDate,
                                                                        java.util.Date toDate,
                                                                        java.lang.Long locationId,
                                                                        TeamMember teamMember,
                                                                        java.lang.Integer pageStart,
                                                                        java.lang.Integer rowCount)
                                                                 throws DgException
        Searches activities. Please note that this method is too slow if there are too many activities, because hibernate should load them all. Please use pagination.
        Parameters:
        ampThemeId - filter by program
        statusCode - filter by status if not null
        donorOrgId - filter by donor org if not null
        fromDate - filter by date if not null
        toDate - filter by date if not null
        locationId - filter by location if not null
        teamMember - filter by team if not null
        pageStart - if null then 0 is assumed.
        rowCount - number of activities to return
        Returns:
        list of activities.
        Throws:
        DgException

      • searchActivitieProgPercents

        public static java.util.Collection<ActivityItem> searchActivitieProgPercents(java.lang.Long ampThemeId,
                                                                             java.lang.String statusCode,
                                                                             java.lang.String donorOrgId,
                                                                             java.util.Date fromDate,
                                                                             java.util.Date toDate,
                                                                             java.lang.Long locationId,
                                                                             TeamMember teamMember,
                                                                             java.lang.Integer pageStart,
                                                                             java.lang.Integer rowCount)
                                                                      throws DgException

        Searches activities which are assigened to specific program and returns collection of ActivityItem objects. Each object is created using ActivityItem#ActivityItem(AmpActivity,Long) constructor.

        Please note that this method is too slow if there are too many activities, because hibernate should load them all. Please use pagination.

        Parameters:
        ampThemeId - filter by program
        statusCode - filter by status if not null
        donorOrgId - filter by donor org if not null
        fromDate - filter by date if not null
        toDate - filter by date if not null
        locationId - filter by location if not null
        teamMember - filter by team if not null
        pageStart - if null then 0 is assumed.
        rowCount - number of activities to return
        Returns:
        list of activities.
        Throws:
        DgException
        See Also:
        ActivityItem

      • getActivityCollisions

        public static IdWithValueShim getActivityCollisions(java.lang.String name,
                                                    AmpActivityGroup g)
        checks whether the 'name' activity title exists as a translation in any language in any latest version of an activity excluding the activity group of the current activity
        Parameters:
        name - title of the activity
        g - activity group of the activity in question
        Returns:
        null if no collisions found or IdWithValueShim with amp_activity_id and team name in case of collision
